Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits deceptive rate advertising for certain accommodations
Summary: Prohibits deceptive rate advertising for certain accommodations; requires advertised rates to be inclusive of all taxes and automatic fees; requires the non-inclusive rate, and an itemized list of taxes and automatic fees to be provided to the consumer prior to a person finalizing their purchase.
LawCode: Add ยง209-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting deceptive rate advertising for certain accommodations
